00028 #define IS_ONLY_IN_CITIES ( gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowReinforcementsOnlyInCity ? TRUE: FALSE )
00029 
00030 UINT8 gubReinforcementMinEnemyStaticGroupSize = 12;
00031 
00032 void GetNumberOfEnemiesInFiveSectors( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 *pubNumAdmins, UINT8 *pubNumTroops, UINT8 *pubNumElites )
00033 {
00034       UINT8 ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites;
00035       UINT16 pusMoveDir[4][3];
00036       UINT8 ubDirNumber, ubIndex;
00037       
00038       GetNumberOfStationaryEnemiesInSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, pubNumAdmins, pubNumTroops, pubNumElites );
00039 
00040       GetNumberOfMobileEnemiesInSectorWithoutRoadBlock( sSectorX, sSectorY, &ubNumAdmins, &ubNumTroops, &ubNumElites );
00041 
00042       *pubNumAdmins += ubNumAdmins;
00043       *pubNumTroops += ubNumTroops;
00044       *pubNumElites += ubNumElites;
00045 
00046       if( !gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowReinforcements )
00047             return;
00048 
00049       if ( ( GetTownIdForSector( sSectorX, sSectorY ) == OMERTA )&&( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel != DIF_LEVEL_INSANE ) ) //Madd: skip Omerta //Lal: but not on insane ;-)
00050             return;
00051 
00052       GenerateDirectionInfos( sSectorX, sSectorY, &ubDirNumber, pusMoveDir, 
00053             ( GetTownIdForSector( sSectorX, sSectorY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, IS_ONLY_IN_CITIES );
00054 
00055       for( ubIndex = 0; ubIndex < ubDirNumber; ubIndex++ )
00056       {
00057             GetNumberOfStationaryEnemiesInSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ),  &ubNumAdmins, &ubNumTroops, &ubNumElites );
00058 
00059             while( ubNumElites + ubNumTroops + ubNumAdmins > gubReinforcementMinEnemyStaticGroupSize)
00060             {
00061                   if( ubNumElites )
00062                   {
00063                         *pubNumElites += 1;
00064                         ubNumElites--;
00065                   }else if( ubNumTroops )
00066                   {
00067                         *pubNumTroops += 1;
00068                         ubNumTroops--;
00069                   }else if( ubNumAdmins )
00070                   {
00071                         *pubNumAdmins += 1;
00072                         ubNumAdmins--;
00073                   }
00074             }
00075             
00076 
00077             GetNumberOfMobileEnemiesInSectorWithoutRoadBlock( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ),  &ubNumAdmins, &ubNumTroops, &ubNumElites );
00078 
00079             *pubNumAdmins += ubNumAdmins;
00080             *pubNumTroops += ubNumTroops;
00081             *pubNumElites += ubNumElites;
00082       }
00083 }
00084 
00085 UINT8 NumEnemiesInFiveSectors( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00086 {
00087       UINT8 ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites;
00088 
00089       GetNumberOfEnemiesInFiveSectors( sMapX, sMapY, &ubNumAdmins, &ubNumTroops, &ubNumElites );
00090       
00091       return ubNumAdmins + ubNumTroops + ubNumElites;
00092 }

00094 BOOLEAN IsGroupInARightSectorToReinforce( GROUP *pGroup, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
00095 {
00096       UINT16 pusMoveDir[4][3];
00097       UINT8 ubDirNumber = 0, ubIndex;
00098 
00099       if( pGroup->ubSectorX == sSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == sSectorY )
00100             return TRUE;  //Well, it's in the same sector, so allow to reinforce
00101 
00102       if( !gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowReinforcements )
00103             return FALSE;
00104 
00105       GenerateDirectionInfos( sSectorX, sSectorY, &ubDirNumber, pusMoveDir, 
00106             ( GetTownIdForSector( sSectorX, sSectorY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, IS_ONLY_IN_CITIES );
00107 
00108       for( ubIndex = 0; ubIndex < ubDirNumber; ubIndex++ )
00109             if( pGroup->ubSectorX == SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ) && pGroup->ubSectorY == SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ) )
00110                   return TRUE;
00111 
00112       return FALSE;
00113 }

00115 UINT8 GetAdjacentSectors( UINT8 pSectors[4], INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
00116 {
00117       UINT16 pusMoveDir[4][3];
00118       UINT8 ubDirNumber = 0, ubIndex;
00119       UINT8 ubCounter = 0;
00120 
00121       GenerateDirectionInfos( sSectorX, sSectorY, &ubDirNumber, pusMoveDir, 
00122             ( GetTownIdForSector( sSectorX, sSectorY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, IS_ONLY_IN_CITIES );
00123 
00124       for( ubIndex = 0; ubIndex < ubDirNumber; ubIndex++ )
00125             pSectors[ ubCounter++ ] = (UINT8)pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ];
00126 
00127       return ubCounter;
00128 }

00131 {
00132       UINT8 ubResult = 0;
00133       UINT16 pusMoveDir[4][3];
00134       UINT8 ubDirNumber, ubIndex;
00135       
00136       ubResult = CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY );
00137 
00138       if( !gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowReinforcements )
00139             return ubResult;
00140 
00141       GenerateDirectionInfos( sMapX, sMapY, &ubDirNumber, pusMoveDir, 
00142             ( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, IS_ONLY_IN_CITIES );
00143 
00144       for( ubIndex = 0; ubIndex < ubDirNumber; ubIndex++ )
00145             ubResult += CountAllMilitiaInSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ) );
00146 
00147 
00148       return ubResult;
00149 }

00172 BOOLEAN ARMoveBestMilitiaManFromAdjacentSector(INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY)
00173 {
00174       UINT8 ubResult = 0;
00175       UINT16 pusMoveDir[4][3];
00176       UINT8 ubDirNumber;
00177       UINT8 ubRandom;
00178       
00179       if( !gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowReinforcements )
00180             return FALSE;
00181 
00182       if( CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) >= gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSize ||
00183             CountAllMilitiaInFiveSectors( sMapX, sMapY ) - CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == 0 )
00184                   return FALSE;
00185 
00186       GenerateDirectionInfos( sMapX, sMapY, &ubDirNumber, pusMoveDir, 
00187             ( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, IS_ONLY_IN_CITIES );
00188 
00189       ubRandom = Random( ubDirNumber );
00190 
00191       while( !MoveOneBestMilitiaMan( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubRandom ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubRandom ][ 0 ] ), sMapX, sMapY )  )
00192             ubRandom = Random( ubDirNumber );
00193       
00194       return TRUE;
00195 }
00196 
00197 BOOLEAN ARRemoveMilitiaMan( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8 ubRank )
00198 {
00199       UINT16 pusMoveDir[4][3];
00200       UINT8 ubDirNumber, ubRandom;
00201       
00202       if( MilitiaInSectorOfRank( sMapX, sMapY, ubRank ) )
00203       {
00204             StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( sMapX, sMapY, ubRank, 1 );
00205             ARMoveBestMilitiaManFromAdjacentSector( sMapX, sMapY );
00206             return TRUE;
00207       }
00208 
00209       if( !gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowReinforcements )
00210             return FALSE;
00211 
00212       GenerateDirectionInfos( sMapX, sMapY, &ubDirNumber, pusMoveDir, 
00213             ( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, IS_ONLY_IN_CITIES );
00214 
00215       for( ; ;  )
00216       {
00217             ubRandom = Random( ubDirNumber );
00218             if( MilitiaInSectorOfRank( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubRandom ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubRandom ][ 0 ] ), ubRank ) )
00219             {
00220                   StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubRandom ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubRandom ][ 0 ] ), ubRank, 1 );
00221                   return TRUE;
00222             }
00223       }
00224 
00225 
00226       return FALSE;
00227 }

00229 GROUP* GetEnemyGroupInSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00230 {
00231       GROUP *curr;
00232       curr = gpGroupList;
00233       while( curr )
00234       {
00235             if( curr->ubSectorX == sMapX && curr->ubSectorY == sMapY && !curr->fPlayer && curr->ubGroupID )
00236                   return curr;
00237             curr = curr->next;
00238       }
00239       return NULL;
00240 }

00242 
00243 UINT8 DoReinforcementAsPendingEnemy( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00244 {
00245       UINT16 pusMoveDir[4][3];
00246       UINT8 ubDirNumber = 0, ubIndex;
00247       GROUP *pGroup;
00248       SECTORINFO *pThisSector, *pSector;
00249 
00250       if( !gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowReinforcements )
00251             return 255;
00252 
00253       if ( ( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == OMERTA )&&( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel != DIF_LEVEL_INSANE ) ) //Madd: skip Omerta //Lal: but not on insane ;-)
00254             return 255;
00255 
00256       pThisSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ];
00257 
00258       GenerateDirectionInfos( sMapX, sMapY, &ubDirNumber, pusMoveDir, 
00259             ( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, IS_ONLY_IN_CITIES );
00260 
00261       for( ubIndex = 0; ubIndex < ubDirNumber; ubIndex++ )
00262             if( NumMobileEnemiesInSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ) ) && GetEnemyGroupInSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ) ) )
00263             {
00264                   pGroup = GetEnemyGroupInSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ) );
00265                   
00266                   pGroup->ubPrevX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
00267                   pGroup->ubPrevY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
00268 
00269                   pGroup->ubSectorX = pGroup->ubNextX = (UINT8)sMapX;
00270                   pGroup->ubSectorY = pGroup->ubNextY = (UINT8)sMapY;
00271 
00272                   return (UINT8)pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 2 ];
00273             }
00274 
00275       if( NumEnemiesInFiveSectors( sMapX, sMapY ) - NumEnemiesInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == 0 )
00276       {
00277             return 255;
00278       }else
00279             for(;;)
00280       {
00281             ubIndex = Random(ubDirNumber);
00282             if( NumEnemiesInSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ) ) > gubReinforcementMinEnemyStaticGroupSize )
00283             {
00284                   pSector = &SectorInfo[ pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ];
00285 
00286                   if( pSector->ubNumElites )
00287                   {
00288                         (pThisSector->ubNumElites)++;
00289                         (pSector->ubNumElites)--;
00290                   }else if( pSector->ubNumTroops )
00291                   {
00292                         (pThisSector->ubNumTroops)++;
00293                         (pSector->ubNumTroops)--;
00294                   }else if( pSector->ubNumAdmins )
00295                   {
00296                         (pThisSector->ubNumAdmins)++;
00297                         (pSector->ubNumAdmins)--;
00298                   }
00299 
00300                   return (UINT8)pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 2 ];
00301             }
00302       }
00303 }

00305 
00306 UINT8 NumFreeMilitiaSlots()
00307 {
00308       UINT8 ubNumFreeSlots = 0;
00309       INT32 i;
00310       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00311       //Count the number of free militia slots.  It is possible to have multiple groups exceed the maximum.
00312       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM].bLastID; i++ )
00313       {
00314             pSoldier = &Menptr[ i ];
00315             if( !pSoldier->bActive )
00316                   ubNumFreeSlots++;
00317       }
00318       return max( 0 , ubNumFreeSlots - ( 32 - gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSize ) );
00319 }

00321 UINT8 DoReinforcementAsPendingMilitia( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT8 *pubRank )
00322 {
00323       UINT16 pusMoveDir[4][3];
00324       UINT8 ubDirNumber = 0, ubIndex;
00325       SECTORINFO *pSector;//*pThisSector,
00326 
00327       if( !gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowReinforcements )
00328             return 255;
00329 
00330 //    pThisSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ];
00331 
00332       GenerateDirectionInfos( sMapX, sMapY, &ubDirNumber, pusMoveDir, 
00333             ( GetTownIdForSector( sMapX, sMapY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ? TRUE : FALSE ), TRUE, IS_ONLY_IN_CITIES );
00334 
00335       if( CountAllMilitiaInFiveSectors( sMapX, sMapY ) - CountAllMilitiaInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == 0 )
00336       {
00337             *pubRank = 255;
00338             return 255;
00339       }else
00340             for(;;)
00341       {
00342             ubIndex = Random(ubDirNumber);
00343             if( CountAllMilitiaInSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ) ) )
00344             {
00345                   pSector = &SectorInfo[ pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ];
00346 
00347                   if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ ELITE_MILITIA ] )
00348                   {
00349                         StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sMapX, sMapY,ELITE_MILITIA, 1 );
00350                         StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ),ELITE_MILITIA, 1 );
00351                         *pubRank = ELITE_MILITIA;
00352                   }else if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ REGULAR_MILITIA ] )
00353                   {
00354                         StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sMapX, sMapY,REGULAR_MILITIA, 1 );
00355                         StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ),REGULAR_MILITIA, 1 );
00356                         *pubRank = REGULAR_MILITIA;
00357                   }else if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ GREEN_MILITIA ] )
00358                   {
00359                         StrategicAddMilitiaToSector( sMapX, sMapY,GREEN_MILITIA, 1 );
00360                         StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( SECTORX( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ), SECTORY( pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] ),GREEN_MILITIA, 1 );
00361                         *pubRank = GREEN_MILITIA;
00362                   }
00363 
00364                   return (UINT8)pusMoveDir[ ubIndex ][ 2 ];
00365             }
00366       }
00367       
00368 }

00370 
00371 void AddPossiblePendingMilitiaToBattle()
00372 {
00373 
00374       UINT8 ubSlots;
00375       UINT8 ubNumElites, ubNumRegulars, ubNumGreens;
00376       SECTORINFO *pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
00377       static UINT8 ubPredefinedInsertionCode = 255;
00378       static UINT8 ubPredefinedRank = 255;
00379 
00380       if( !PlayerMercsInSector( (UINT8)gWorldSectorX, (UINT8)gWorldSectorY, 0 ) || !CountAllMilitiaInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) 
00381             || !NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ) return;
00382 //gGameExternalOptions.guiMaxMilitiaSquadSize - CountAllMilitiaInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
00383       ubSlots = NumFreeMilitiaSlots();
00384       if( !ubSlots )
00385       { //no available slots to add militia  to.  Try again later...
00386             return;
00387       }
00388       
00389       if( ubPredefinedInsertionCode != 255 && ubPredefinedRank != 255 &&
00390             CountAllMilitiaInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) )
00391       {
00392             ubNumElites = ubNumRegulars = ubNumGreens = 0;
00393 
00394       //    while( ubSlots )
00395             switch( ubPredefinedRank )
00396             {
00397                   case ELITE_MILITIA:
00398                         ubSlots--;
00399                         ubNumElites++;
00400                         break;
00401                   case REGULAR_MILITIA:
00402                         ubSlots--;
00403                         ubNumRegulars++;
00404                         break;
00405                   case GREEN_MILITIA:
00406                         ubSlots--;
00407                         ubNumGreens++;
00408                         break;
00409                   default:
00410                         ubSlots--;
00411             }
00412 
00413             if( ubNumGreens || ubNumRegulars || ubNumElites )
00414                   AddSoldierInitListMilitiaOnEdge( ubPredefinedInsertionCode, ubNumGreens, ubNumRegulars, ubNumElites );
00415       }
00416 
00417       ubPredefinedInsertionCode = 255;
00418       ubPredefinedRank = 255;
00419 
00420       if( ubSlots )
00421       { //After going through the process, we have finished with some free slots and no more enemies to add.
00422     //So, we can turn off the flag, as this check is no longer needed.
00423             ubPredefinedInsertionCode = DoReinforcementAsPendingMilitia( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, &ubPredefinedRank );
00424 
00425             if( ubPredefinedInsertionCode != 255 )
00426                   AddPossiblePendingMilitiaToBattle();
00427       }
00428 
00429 }
